title: Implement machine learning model deployment pipeline
description: Build automated ML model deployment system that validates model performance, manages version control, and monitors production model accuracy with rollback capabilities
iWant: automated ML model deployment with performance validation and monitoring
soThat: I can deploy models within 20 minutes and maintain 95% accuracy in production
acceptanceCriteria: Model validation tests complete within 20 minutes of deployment request
Production accuracy monitoring alerts when performance drops below 95%
Automatic rollback triggers when model accuracy degrades by more than 5%
Version control tracks all model deployments with performance metrics
